Summary Note:
The RM first met Lang Schnell Reiter at a wine tasting event in Vienna. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
Having worked for over 26 years, Lang Schnell Reiter brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
Family Background: Lang Schnell Reiter is currently single. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
Lang received his secondary school diploma from BG/BRG Neusiedl am See in 1993.
Lang completed his university education at FH Joanneum University of Applied Sciences in 2000.
Occupation History:
Lang Schnell Reiter is a 49 year old Venture Capitalist from Austria. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Lang Schnell Reiter's first role was as a Software Developer at SAP Austria GmbH, where he worked diligently from 1999 to 2001 to establish a strong reputation.
In 2001, he moved to Microsoft Austria GmbH to work as a Startup Founder, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
From 2003 to 2007, he served as a CEO at Microsoft Austria GmbH, solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
He appointment as a Venture Capitalist at Cisco Systems Austria GmbH in 2007 marked a significant milestone in his career, as he took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 1130000 EUR.
He has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 3083000 EUR.

He inherited a significant sum of 2610000 EUR from his grandfather, a respected Hedge Fund Manager, in 2015, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In summary, Lang has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
